1270.18Conversion of dwellings to more units.

1270.19Private swimming pools.

1270.20Community and club swimming pools.

1270.21Setback requirements for corner buildings.

1270.22Special regulations for commercial and industrial uses.

1270.23Fire hazards.

1270.24Radioactivity; electrical disturbances.

1270.25Noise.

1270.30Glare.

1270.41Application of certain supplementary regulations. 1270.42Side and rear yards for nonresidential uses abutting Residential Districts. 1270.43Minimum lot sizes for any Residential District abutting an R-1 District. 1270.44Exceptions to height regulations.

1270.45Architectural projections.

1270.46Visibility at intersections in Residential Districts. 1270.47Fences, walls and hedges. 1270.48Number of principal structures per lot; accessory buildings in rear yards. 1270.49Parking of unlicensed vehicles on residential property.

1270.50Screening of junk storage and sales areas.

1270.51Temporary structures, construction equipment and materials.

1270.52Open storage and display of materials and equipment.

1270.53Bed and breakfasts.

1270.54Personal wireless service facilities.

CROSS REFERENCES

Restriction in location of buildings and structures - see Ohio R.C. 713.07

Restrictions on height of buildings and structures - see Ohio R.C. 713.08

Restrictions on bulk and location of buildings and structures, percentage of lot occupancy and set-back building lines - see Ohio R.C. 713.09

General provisions and definitions - see P. & Z. Ch. 1260

Districts and uses generally - see P. & Z. Ch. 1264

Schedule of District Regulations - see P. & Z. Title 6, Appx. A
